title: BuzzBistro
description: A complete food ordering website with user authentication, shopping cart, admin panel, backend server, and Stripe payment integration.

title: Weather App
description: This weather app provides real-time city searches with a toggle for metric and imperial units, offering quick and convenient weather updates.

title: To-Do List App
description: Developed a fully functional To-Do List web application using React.js and Tailwind CSS. The app allows users to add, edit, mark tasks as complete/incomplete, and delete them from the list. Tasks are stored locally in the browser to persist across sessions.
